title: Two Games at once??????
body:
OK Guys heres a new one, I have just been dc'd from a game, however it would not let me reconnect and i am now in a lobby to play another game, how is this possible as my original game is clearly still live, (a friend confirmed and was watching it). i am technically in two games at once. 

Anyone else experienced this?

replies.body:
It sounds kinda like a ghost game (a game that has ended but still shows as active so you can't queue up again). Not at all sure what would cause this though, very strange. Normally with something like this I'd assume the game you got kicked from wasn't actually still active but if someone was spectating it that's very weird.

Hiccups of this nature do pop up from time to time though and are usually very isolated. Unless it happens to you again or more people start reporting it I wouldn't worry about it :)

I think I experienced this _'once'_ a few years ago, never happened to me again since.

It's just a random glitch, and quite rare.
